metadata.Title: CVE-2019-17546 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
tif_getimage.c in LibTIFF through 4.0.10, as used in GDAL through 3.0.1 and other products, has an integer overflow that potentially causes a heap-based buffer overflow via a crafted RGBA image, related to a "Negative-size-param" condition. It was discovered that GDAL incorrectly handled certain malformed images. If a user or automated system were tricked into opening a specially crafted image, a remote attacker could crash the application, leading to a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code with user privileges.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-17546` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

chromium-browser - 80.0.3987.87-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-browser-l10n - 80.0.3987.87-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-chromedriver - 80.0.3987.87-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 80.0.3987.87-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 80.0.3987.87-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.3
libtiff-tools - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.3
libtiff5 - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.3
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.3
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: blender package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
chromium-browser package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '80.0.3987.87-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
insighttoolkit4 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
ivtools package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
libtk-img package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
neuron package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
paraview package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
povray package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
qtimageformats-opensource-src package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
sfftobmp package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
texmaker package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
tiff package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.9-5ubuntu0.3').
xloadimage package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
